channel.title: Need help with max hits for range. Please and thank you
channel.description: My dbow maxed a 22 23 in full void range.. and my rune cbow hits like 22's at best. I was testing hits for 2 hours and thats all I got.. it's a 317. Any help?

item.title: Need help with max hits for range. Please and thank you
item.dc:creator: @PaidPerPk PaidPerPk
item.description:
@PaidPerPk wrote:

Still didn’t work damnit… I really need help.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with max hits for range. Please and thank you

item.title: Need help with max hits for range. Please and thank you
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

maxRangeHit() is for the strength of the bow, maxRangeHit2() is the strength of the arrow, change the numbers

if(!hasCrystalBow() && (playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 892 || playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 893)) { d *= 1.6000000000000001D;
That is a rune arrow, the strength is d *= 1.6000000000000001D;
To make it a bit stronger make it something like d *= 1.8500000000000001D;

Get the picture? Play around with the number till you get something you like

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with max hits for range. Please and thank you

item.title: Need help with max hits for range. Please and thank you
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

That is because range bonus’ are defined in client.java, in the two voids maxRangeHit() and maxRangeHit2()

Read full topic
